name: Yatzy Multiplayer
description:
"It's yatzy multiplayer!" - that's what you will say joyfully when you get highest score! This game is an UNIQUE combination of Dice and Poker number which is loved by millions of people over the years in the name of Yatzy, Yahtzy, Yachty, farkle, Poker Dice!

Play with friends, family and players around the world. Challenge your buddies and take them over one-on-one competition.

Play this classic dice game with your friends and family prepare to shout “YATZY”!

UNIQUE Features:
• Very easy to learn
• Intuitive graphics and animations
• Very addictive - you will not want to put it down

Cross Platform & Real Time Multiplayer:
• Play yatzy on iPhone and iPad. It goes with you where ever you!
• Real time multiplayer so that you can always play with your friends, family and buddies online. Challenge top players and make them your buddies.
• The game is FREE forever!

Socially Connected:
• Connect with Facebook and challenge your friends instantly!
• Go one-on-one to play Dice Dual games with your fiends and players.
• Chat with the buddies to have joyful exchange of words!

MULTIPLAYER GAMES WITH FRIENDS!
• Play games with friends and prove you’re the best dice roller
• Social multiplayer matches where anything can happen!

Custom Dice and Frames:
• Change your look and feel with custom Dice and Frames which will change your impression forever!

DICE CUSTOMIZATION & AMAZING BONUSES!
• CUSTOM DICE let you personalize your game!
• Free dice roll bonuses let you score even higher!

Daily NEW Tournaments and Events:
• Enjoy playing in Daily Tournaments and stay on top of them to get best Rewards and Achievements!
• Play against Dice Masters, defeat them and sharpen your skills of winning the matches. Get excellent rewards by clearing the Event levels.

Scratchers, Diamonds and Dice Rolls:
• Scratchers help you go get more Dice Rolls, Diamonds allows you to play Dice Dual games and with Dice Rolls you can get your best combination of dice.

Do you have any questions? We are here to help: info@gamewithpals.com
